news.title: Real Estate Introduce New Guitarist James Richardson
news.summary: Richardson replaces the departed Julian Lynch as the band goes on its Atlas anniversary tour

news.title: Gorillaz Announce New Album The Mountain, Share New Song Featuring Sparks: Listen
news.summary: Idles, Kara Jackson, Yasiin Bey, Johnny Marr, Bizarrap, and others also feature on the follow-up to 2023’s Cracker Island

news.title: Malibu Announces Debut Album Vanities, Shares New Song: Listen
news.summary: “So Sweet & Willing” is the latest single from the French ambient artist’s Year0001 release
